item.description:
This event is posted on my walking club where 30 people have rsvp'd already. The room holds 60.

I have reserved a private room for us at the Village Smokehouse for some Texan BBQ! Dinner will be buffet style and the menu is "Choose (3) from chicken, beef ribs, pork ribs, pulled pork, sausage, and brisket. Includes salad, cole slaw, beans and cornbread. Additional side orders may be ordered for $1.95 per person. Choose from rice, potato salad, baked potato homemade mashed potatoes, french fries or corn on the cob. Full Bar Air Conditioned Function Room. $18.95 per person, (with tax and 18% gratuity $23.31)"

www.villagesmokehouse.com
item.name: BBQ Dinner
